mapper.insert: insert into score (score_id, score_point, record_time, drom_id, room_id) values (#{scoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scorePoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dromId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select score_id, score_point, record_time, drom_id, room_id from score
